benchmark_details.name: XplainLLM
benchmark_details.overview: XplainLLM is a dataset for enhancing the transparency and reliability of Large Language Models (LLMs) by providing structured explanations of model reasoning behavior through grounded knowledge graphs and graph attention networks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance interpretability and accountability of Large Language Models (LLMs) through structured, grounded explanations.

data.annotation: Human review for accuracy and clarity

methodology.calculation: Metrics are evaluated based on feedback from human experts and automated evaluators scoring on a scale of 1 to 3.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better quality, with trustworthiness linked to clarity and accuracy of explanations.
methodology.validation: Human evaluation of generated explanations and comparative performance analysis with and without the framework.
